publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1458 Chris Ballance: Call for Resignation of Scottish Opera Chairman, Duncan McGhie-That the Parliament supports the chorus of Scottish Opera and the union, Equity, in their fight to retain jobs for singers in Scotland and believes that the chairman of Scottish Opera, Duncan McGhie, who has failed to ensure that the company spends according to its income, failed to ensure the continuity of productions and failed to retain jobs for his staff, should resign.

S2M-1458 Chris Ballance: Call for Resignation of Scottish Opera Chairman, Duncan McGhie-That the Parliament supports the chorus of Scottish Opera and the union, Equity, in their fight to retain jobs for singers in Scotland and believes that the chairman of Scottish Opera, Duncan McGhie, who has failed to ensure that the company spends according to its income, failed to ensure the continuity of productions and failed to retain jobs for his staff, should resign. Supported by: Ms Rosemary Byrne*
